m_szDocSumamry: FrogHeart Commentary about nanotech, science policy and communication, society, and the arts Menu Skip to content Home About and Contact Acknowledging the folks who supported my S.NET 2012 work Donations and thank yous Monthly Archives: July 2015 Mathematics, music, art, architecture, culture: Bridges 2015 Leave a reply Thanks to Alex Bellos and Tash Reith-Banks for their July 30, 2015 posting on the Guardian science blog network for pointing towards the Bridges 2015 conference, The Bridges Conference is an annual event that explores the connections between art and mathematics.
